extent.charseq: the only real winners from class actions
companies that go over the line and need to be hit with a stick called a law suit
The only people who profit from class actions
The companies making similar drugs (Celebrex and Bextra
promising "easy credit" for which no one qualifies and then charges ridiculously high interest rates

ldc_scope.charseq: the only tort reform that i think should be done is to cap fees that lawyers are allowed to extract for class action suits

i feel that there is a valuable public service that comes from class actions suits which is to keep companies on the straight and narrow so that they avoid such actions... but from a monetary perspective the only real winners from class actions are the lawyers

i feel that there is a valuable public service that comes from class actions suits which is to keep companies on the straight and narrow so that they avoid such actions... but from a monetary perspective the only real winners from class actions are the lawyers
The only people who profit from class actions are the lawyers
All class actions do is enrich lawyers and raise costs to everyone
The cost of class actions is factored into the cost of everything you buy
i remember once receiving a fifty cent check in an envelope with postage of at least half that amount for the great 17" monitor class action suit

extent.charseq: Dell is involved in a class action suit for "bait and switch", where a nurse claims Dell switched parts and charged her for the more expensive items, and for promising "easy credit" for which no one qualifies and then charges ridiculously high interest rates

extent.charseq: promising "easy credit" for which no one qualifies and then charges ridiculously high interest rates

ldc_scope.charseq: i agree that the buyer probably didn't read the credit terms to find themselves with an unexpected rate... i always see that "for qualified customers" in all of their advertisements that probably releases them of any wrong doing... but i also believe in the court systems so let it take its course and see what happens
